articles.description: Rani Mukerji praises 12th Fail after being 'offended' by Prithvi Konanur asking people to watch Iranian cinema. Twitter thinks 'she does not makes sense'. | Bollywood
articles.content: Rani Mukerji recently said that India 'makes the best films in the world' as she gave the example of Vikrant Massey-starrer 12th Fail, based on IPS officer Manoj Kumar Sharma's life. During a recent … [+3822 chars]
